languages.text: {n}При вашем приближении {g|Encyclopedia:Lumen}люмены{/g} грузного корпуса мастер-когитатора недовольно загораются, а фильтры охлаждения издают сварливый вздох. Кажется, дух машины не в лучшем настроении.{/n}

{n}At your approach, the {g|Encyclopedia:Lumen}lumens{/g} on the master cogitator's bulky hull light up peevishly, and the cooling filters breathe an exasperated sigh. The machine spirit appears to be in a rotten mood.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}При вашем приближении {g|Encyclopedia:Lumen}люмены{/g} грузного корпуса мастер-когитатора недовольно загораются, а фильтры охлаждения издают сварливый вздох. Кажется, дух машины не в лучшем настроении.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}At your approach, the lumens on the master cogitator's bulky hull light up peevishly, and the cooling filters breathe an exasperated sigh. The machine spirit appears to be in a rotten mood.{/n}

{n}At your approach, the {g|Encyclopedia:Lumen}lumens{/g} on the master cogitator's bulky hull light up peevishly, and the cooling filters breathe an exasperated sigh. The machine spirit appears to be in a rotten mood.{/n}

{n}At your approach, the {g|Encyclopedia:Lumen}lumens{/g} on the master cogitator's bulky hull light up peevishly, and the cooling filters breathe an exasperated sigh. The machine spirit appears to be in a rotten mood.{/n}

languages.text: {n}À votre approche, les {g|Encyclopedia:Lumen}lumens{/g} fixés sur le châssis imposant du maître-cogitateur clignotent avec irritation, et ses filtres de refroidissement poussent un soupir exaspéré. De toute évidence, l'esprit de la machine est de mauvais poil.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}At your approach, the {g|Encyclopedia:Lumen}lumens{/g} on the master cogitator's bulky hull light up peevishly, and the cooling filters breathe an exasperated sigh. The machine spirit appears to be in a rotten mood.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}À votre approche, les lumens fixés sur le châssis imposant du maître-cogitateur clignotent avec irritation, et ses filtres de refroidissement poussent un soupir exaspéré. De toute évidence, l'esprit de la machine est de mauvais poil.{/n}

{n}À votre approche, les lumens fixés sur le châssis imposant du maître-cogitateur clignotent avec irritation, et ses filtres de refroidissement poussent un soupir exaspéré. De toute évidence, l'esprit de la machine est de mauvais poil.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Cuando te aproximas, los {g|Encyclopedia:Lumen}lumens{/g} de la gruesa carcasa del cogitador maestro se iluminan fastidiosamente, y sus filtros de refrigeración suspiran con exasperación. El espíritu máquina parece estar de muy mal humor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}At your approach, the {g|Encyclopedia:Lumen}lumens{/g} on the master cogitator's bulky hull light up peevishly, and the cooling filters breathe an exasperated sigh. The machine spirit appears to be in a rotten mood.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Cuando te aproximas, los lumens de la gruesa carcasa del cogitador maestro se iluminan fastidiosamente, y sus filtros de refrigeración suspiran con exasperación. El espíritu máquina parece estar de muy mal humor.{/n}

languages.text: {n}当你靠近时，主沉思者笨重外壳上的{g|Encyclopedia:Lumen}流明灯{/g}恼火地亮了起来，冷却过滤器也发出了怒气冲冲的叹息声。机魂的心情好像不怎么样。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}At your approach, the {g|Encyclopedia:Lumen}lumens{/g} on the master cogitator's bulky hull light up peevishly, and the cooling filters breathe an exasperated sigh. The machine spirit appears to be in a rotten mood.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}当你靠近时，主沉思者笨重外壳上的流明灯恼火地亮了起来，冷却过滤器也发出了怒气冲冲的叹息声。机魂的心情好像不怎么样。{/n}

languages.text: {n}あなたが近付くと、 マスター・コジテーターのごつごつした外壁の{g|Encyclopedia:Lumen}ルーメン{/g}が恨めしそうに光った。冷却フィルターは苛立ちを隠せないかのように、ため息をつく。機械精霊はかなり不機嫌そうだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}At your approach, the {g|Encyclopedia:Lumen}lumens{/g} on the master cogitator's bulky hull light up peevishly, and the cooling filters breathe an exasperated sigh. The machine spirit appears to be in a rotten mood.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたが近付くと、 マスター・コジテーターのごつごつした外壁のルーメンが恨めしそうに光った。冷却フィルターは苛立ちを隠せないかのように、ため息をつく。機械精霊はかなり不機嫌そうだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Als du dich näherst, beginnen die {g|Encyclopedia:Lumen}Lumens{/g} auf dem klobigen Gehäuse des Meister-Cogitators mürrisch zu leuchten, und die Kühlfilter stoßen ein gereiztes Seufzen aus. Der Maschinengeist hat offenbar fürchterliche Laune.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}At your approach, the {g|Encyclopedia:Lumen}lumens{/g} on the master cogitator's bulky hull light up peevishly, and the cooling filters breathe an exasperated sigh. The machine spirit appears to be in a rotten mood.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Als du dich näherst, beginnen die Lumens auf dem klobigen Gehäuse des Meister-Cogitators mürrisch zu leuchten, und die Kühlfilter stoßen ein gereiztes Seufzen aus. Der Maschinengeist hat offenbar fürchterliche Laune.{/n}

{n}Als du dich näherst, beginnen die Lumens auf dem klobigen Gehäuse des Meister-Cogitators mürrisch zu leuchten, und die Kühlfilter stoßen ein gereiztes Seufzen aus. Der Maschinengeist hat offenbar fürchterliche Laune.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Yaklaşmanla birlikte ana kavramsayarın hacimli gövdesi üzerindeki {g|Encyclopedia:Lumen}lümenler{/g}, hırçın bir şekilde aydınlanıyor. Soğutma filtreleri ise bezgin bir nefes veriyor. Anlaşılan makine ruhunun hâletiruhiyesi son derece kötü.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}At your approach, the {g|Encyclopedia:Lumen}lumens{/g} on the master cogitator's bulky hull light up peevishly, and the cooling filters breathe an exasperated sigh. The machine spirit appears to be in a rotten mood.{/n}
